name: Cat Hat
description:
It’s 3:27 AM, and you know what that means… time for some nightly zoomies! Just be sure not to break anything, or else your owner might get upset. Collect all of your cat toys when you’re ready for bed, there’s 5 in each room!

Controls:

  • Movement: WASD
  • Jump: Space
  • Reset to Cat Tower: R

Tips:

  • Be wary, cats do NOT like hats.. chaos may ensue
  • Breaking an object will startle the cat, and cause him to jump high in the air! Dangerous, but you may be able to use that to your advantage…
  • Don't forget cats can climb!
  • It’s cool to take it slow, wait around a bit and let your owner fall back to sleep before making any dangerous leaps.
  • There may be some hidden toys, try checking behind or under items!
